abilities.description: The user transforms their body into a house-like factory that can fuse consumed objects and living beings together to create new combinations. This allows Wapol to merge his subordinates or create hybrid weapons.
abilities.significance: First demonstration of the fruit's ability to fuse living beings, not just objects. Shows the disturbing implications of the Devil Fruit's power.

abilities.description: The user can eat any object or material, including inedible and toxic substances, then transform parts of their body into consumed materials.
abilities.significance: Core ability of the fruit that enables all other techniques.

keyMoments.title: Baku Baku Factory Technique Revealed
keyMoments.description: Wapol demonstrates the Baku Baku Factory for the first time, showing the fruit's ability to fuse consumed things together.
keyMoments.significance: Major power reveal that expands understanding of what the Baku Baku no Mi can do.

keyMoments.title: Living Being Fusion
keyMoments.description: Wapol uses Baku Baku Factory to fuse Chess and Kuromarimo into a single being called Chessmarimo.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration that the fruit can fuse living beings, showing its horrifying potential.

weaknesses.description: The user experiences constant hunger due to the fruit's nature.
The fruit has difficulty digesting chewy materials like rubber.
The user cannot manifest objects consumed more than 24 hours ago.

trivia: The name 'Baku Baku' comes from the Japanese onomatopoeia for loud, extreme eating and chewing motions.
Chessmarimo is the first fusion character created by a Devil Fruit ability in the One Piece series.
After his defeat, Wapol later used this ability productively to create a toy manufacturing business.
